member.name: T:QWhale.Syntax.Schemes.LanguageParser
member.summary: Represents parser that performs lexical analysis for predefined set of languages.

member.name: M:QWhale.Syntax.Schemes.LanguageParser.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the LanguageParser class with default settings.

member.name: M:QWhale.Syntax.Schemes.LanguageParser.ShouldSerializeXmlScheme
member.summary: Indicates whether the XmlScheme property should be persisted.
member.returns: True if XmlScheme represents cutom language; otherwise false.

member.name: P:QWhale.Syntax.Schemes.LanguageParser.XmlScheme
member.summary: Gets or sets an xml representation of Scheme property.

member.name: P:QWhale.Syntax.Schemes.LanguageParser.Scheme
member.summary: Gets or sets list of rules for lexical analysis.

member.name: T:QWhale.Syntax.Schemes.Languages
member.summary: Defines set of languages to which performed lexical analysis.
